name: xmcp-monorepo
description: Brom the basement, to all AIs

scripts.ci: pnpm run build && pnpm run lint && pnpm run test:ci
scripts.ci:build-only: pnpm run build && pnpm run lint && pnpm run test:build
scripts.test:ci: pnpm run test:build && pnpm run test:cli
scripts.test:ci:skip-cli: pnpm run test:build && pnpm run test:cli --skip
scripts.reset: rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules packages/*/dist && pnpm install
